resources.string: Egy alkalmazás Google Play-szolgáltatások telepítését kéri.
Egy alkalmazás Google Play-szolgáltatások frissítését kéri.
Egy alkalmazás az Android Wear-alkalmazás frissítését igényli.
Egy alkalmazás Google Play-szolgáltatások engedélyezését kéri.
Az alkalmazás működéséhez a Google Play-szolgáltatások szükségesek, ezek nincsenek telepítve a telefonon.
Az alkalmazás működéséhez a Google Play-szolgáltatások szükségesek, ezek nincsenek telepítve a táblagépen.
Az alkalmazás csak akkor fog működni, ha engedélyezi a Google Play-szolgáltatásokat.
Az alkalmazás csak akkor fog működni, ha frissíti a Google Play-szolgáltatásokat.
Ez az alkalmazás nem működik, amíg nem frissíti az Android Wear-alkalmazást.
A Google Play-szolgáltatásokhoz történő kapcsolódáshoz adatkapcsolat szükséges.
A megadott fiók nem létezik ezen az eszközön. Kérjük, válasszon másik fiókot.
A Google Play-szolgáltatásokat, amelyre egyes alkalmazások támaszkodnak, nem támogatja az eszköz. Segítségért forduljon az eszköz gyártójához.
Az alkalmazásnak szüksége vagy egy vagy több, jelenleg nem elérhető Google Play-szolgáltatásra. További segítségért vegye fel a kapcsolatot a fejlesztővel.
Hiba a megadott fiókba való bejelentkezéskor. Kérjük, válasszon egy másik fiókot.
%s

Long press Wi-Fi button on the side until the light turns blue.
Added files to the download list.
Auto turn on Wi-Fi with device
Current resolution does not meet requirements for auto low light.
Please check if your phone has been connected with your camera. The Wi-Fi light will flash when they are connected. Or restart the camera.
Please restart your phone or try the system settings for the Wi-Fi connection
Current camera is connected with another phone.
System is busy, please try connecting again later.
Device will try searching again when Wi-Fi light flashes.
Capture can only be used during recording.
Current resolution does not meet requirement.
Please stop the download process before deleting this file from the list.
No available space in SD card.
Are you sure to disconnect from camera?
Are you sure to restore factory settings?
Please turn on Wi-Fi to connect after beeps.
Would you like to adjust your time to the clock on your phone?
Are you sure to format SD card?
Successfully shared! Would you like to reconnect your camera now?
Quit sharing and reconnect with camera.
Wi-Fi name must be 1–32 digits formed with numbers and characters, no space.
Password must be 8–64 digits formed with numbers and characters, no space.
Successfully updated Wi-Fi info, please reconnect with your camera.
We need to reconnect Wi-Fi after updating Wi-Fi info, do you want to continue?
You are using the newest firmware.
Failed to download, please try again.
"Uploading the firmware, please keep the camera close to the phone."
Your SD card storage is insufficient, please manage storage and save again.
"No SD card. Please insert SD card and try again."
Firmware update requires other Wi-Fi connection. Do you want to disconnect your phone from camera now?
The camera is updating with the buzzing sound.By rapid beeps, update is complete and the camera will turn off automatically.
Are you sure to download firmware update?
Firmware is being downloaded, make sure to download?
Are you sure to delete XX photos?
Are you sure to continue using cellular data?
We are unable to connect internet, please check your network.
This file is an existing file.
You have already downloaded this file.
Downloading will start soon, confirm you want to continue?
We will disconnect you with your camera and connect you to a valid 3G/Wi-Fi network. Are you sure to continue?
We have saved this file to XXX.
I just shoot a video, check it out!
Do you want to reconnect with your camera?
No network connection now, please share later
How can we help or improve our services?
Failed to obtain information from the SD card.
We were unable to find an SD card, please insert one.
We are unable to find this file.
Cannot be deleted in the loading pictures
The file does not support online play
Camera battery is less than 50%, please recharge
Upgrade file is unusual, please upload again
Exit will remove in the download file, whether to continue?
The current version does not support the camera time taking pictures, please upgrade to the latest version
Does not support is less than 4GB SD card
Firmware synchronization has been completed, the latest version:
Could not find the camera firmware version information, please connect the camera
Recording sound is not supported on current resolution
Time-laspe video is not supported on current resolution
Please wait for video download is complete!
Please retry after connected to the Internet
The network connection is not available, please try again!
Please open cloud in beautiful MIUI gallery album!
Network switch failure, please try again!
The current user does not agree with beautiful MIUI system login user!
Please confirm whether the Wi-Fi password input is correct.
Check failed, please make sure the network is available
After the latest firmware version has been downloaded, please connect the camera to upgrade

"It is detected that last update failed, please read following notes before try again:
1. Make sure that your camera is at least 50% charged before you proceed 2. Do not power off camera or camera Wi-Fi throughout the upgrade process 3. Keep the camera close to your phone 4. Be patient until upgrade is complete and the camera is automatically off
We also suggest you manually update by PC/Mac Guide link: http://www.xiaoyi.com/update/sports"
"At the same time long press power key + Wi-Fi to drop noise The camera automatically restart after reconnecting again Password recovery to the camera1234567890"
"Open the cover, take out the battery Find the SN code, name of the default camera wi-fi For YDXJ SN code add after seven"
You are recommended to upgrade to latest version for normal use.
Camera update file prepared, the process takes only a few minutes.
Last update failed, you can see help before try again.
Please connect the camera to upgrade
Wi-Fi network is not currently connected, download firmware will generate data traffic, are you sure to continue?
Quit will suspend the download, are you sure to continue?
"You are recommended to upgrade to latest version for normal use. Please turn on cellular data or use Wi-Fi to access the latest version."
文件未加载完毕,不能分享
Refreshing the list, temporarily can not be deleted
"Recommended you immediately upgrade to the latest version%1$s Size: %2$s"
"Recommended you immediately upgrade to the latest version%1$s Incremental updating just download: %2$s"
Storage partition is not available, please check the SD card
